movies.name: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
movies.author: Christopher Nolan

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.author: Stephen King

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.author: Mario Puzo

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
movies.author: Jonathan Nolan

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.author: Quentin Tarantino

movies.name: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movies.author: Thomas Keneally

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
movies.author: Chuck Palahniuk

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
movies.author: Winston Groom

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movies.author: The Wachowskis

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
movies.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

movies.name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.
movies.author: George Lucas

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
movies.author: David Franzoni

movies.name: Jurassic Park
movies.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
movies.author: Michael Crichton

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
movies.author: Irene Mecchi

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movies.author: Jonathan Nolan

movies.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
movies.author: Thomas Harris

movies.name: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
movies.author: Robert Rodat

movies.name: The Green Mile
movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
movies.author: Stephen King

movies.name: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
movies.author: William Monahan

movies.name: Braveheart
movies.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
movies.author: Randall Wallace
